div.p: FELT THEY WERE DOING OTHERWISE. THANKS FOR YOUR PATRIOTISM.
I'M LOOKING YOU IN THE EYE. FINALLY TONIGHT, THE "FACTOR"
TIP OF THE DAY. A LOT OF BOOKS FLOATING AROUND.
ONE TO LOOK FOR IS "THE HIT." ANOTHER IS "TERROR RED."
ALSO "THE GUNS AT LAST LIGHT" ABOUT WORLD WAR II.
I'VE READ THEM ALL. BRILLIANT BOOKS.
AND FINALLY USEFUL OBSERVATIONS, OUT NEXT TUESDAY, BASICALLY OUR
